Node.gloss: to be, become vexed|to be, become angry
Node.definition: = state/process by which humans or deities experience displeasure; ◄ caused by someone else's condition or behavior
only used in poetry; = action by which humans or deities express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= fellow member of the same group of people, not necessarily relatives, sharing a bond of affection, employment, or a common purpose

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen

= district around the town of Samaria; ◄ ranging from valley of Jezreel (יִזְרְעֶאל) in the north to the valley of Aijalon (אַיָּלֹון) in the south, with the Mediterranean and the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) as its respective western and eastern borders; ► after the conquest of the town of Samaria repopulated with people from other nations

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state of being, or being taken as, unable to function as can be expected

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which humans restore an object to make it function again in the way it has functioned before
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= to cause to be healthy, strong, and/or prosperous

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= man; ◄ Ammonite (עַמֹּונִי) ► official opposed to Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה) leadership
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker expressing a speaker's confirmation of the truth of a statement; in some cases the truth of this statement is conceded
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= animal that looks like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose and a bushy tail; either reddish with white underparts (fox) or yellowish brown with red tips to the fur on the back (jackal); scavenger; ≈ associated with destruction and devastation, and also with being insignificant but self important

Node.gloss: to break|to breach|to make breaches|to cut
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make one or more large holes in a wall, hedge, or in the ground; ► with the purpose of entering through those holes or of making the area within it vulnerable; ≈ to have a town with a breached wall is also regarded as a deep humiliation

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= block of stone, whether fully square or not;◄ found in nature or hewn from a quarry; ► used for building houses, walls, and other constructions
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
literally: to send back on (someone's) head; hence: = causative process by which humans or deities case (other) humans to receive the appropriate return for their actions, which are mostly evil
= causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which people have been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile
literally: to cover; hence: = action by which humans or deities no longer hold (other) humans responsible for certain actions
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= causative action by which deities decide to no longer hold a certain human's behavior against that person, as if by erasing that sin from one's record

Node.gloss: to trouble|to vex|to provoke to anger
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause other humans or deities to experience displeasure ◄ by their words or behavior
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

Node.gloss: to be joined together|to be combined
Node.definition: = process by which separate objects being joined together to form one unit

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= a location in the middle of an object, on an imaginary division line as if it were divided into two parts
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: to do; hence; = action by which humans and engaged in a specific activity, usually in the service of someone else
